about_the_game:
Embark on an exhilarating journey through Rail Maze 2, with a thrilling fusion of levels, vibrant graphic environments, and a myriad of exciting features to amplify your rail-conquering experience.

🌐 Dive into a world of virtually limitless challenges with online levels that promise an endless array of unique puzzles. Brace yourself as you navigate through treacherous terrains, escaping the menacing PIRATES and elusive GHOSTS on rails. Take command of semaphores, avoid the scorching hazards of steam and lava, and revel in the sheer joy of solving each mind-bending puzzle.

🚄 Rail Maze 2 doesn't just stop there – unleash your creativity with the Level Editor feature, allowing you to construct your own intricate rail mazes and share them with friends and the global gaming community.

🔥 Features:

- Over 100 captivating puzzles to keep your mind engaged
- Virtually UNLIMITED online levels for an ever-evolving challenge
- Navigate through the sizzling challenges of LAVA and STEAM
- Draggable and switchable rails for strategic maneuvering
- Encounter PIRATE and GHOST trains for added excitement
- Handle super long trains, mastering the art of coordination
- Explore the depths of Underground tunnels for hidden surprises
- Strategically manage Semaphores to control the flow of the rail network
- Immerse yourself in four distinct environments: Wild west, Arctic, Dungeon, and Jungle

Rail Maze 2 is not just a game; it's an adventure waiting to unfold. Get ready to conquer the rails and experience the thrill of puzzle-solving like never before. Don't miss out – grab Rail Maze 2 now and dive into a world where challenges and creativity know no bounds!

name: Rail Maze 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Navigate 100+ original puzzles, build railroads, and outsmart PIRATE foes on rails. Create your levels with the Level Editor and solve limitless challenges created by other players. Unleash creativity and conquer the rails in this thrilling puzzle adventure!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Hindi
